name: Tokyo Control Tower
description:
Creation for the GMTK2020 Game Jam out of control.

Lose control as you lose health in this wave based shooter, can you clear all 10 waves?

Due to mouse capture issues in HTML, downloading the game is recommended.

Tested in Firefox, Chrome and Native Windows

Teammates:

Fern: A1Cheerleader,
Preston: Funkmaster
Georgio: HUDBud
